snippet: Quirky, the design collective whose products are often true to its name, has melded milk crate shelving, Lego blocks, and hipster design to create "crates," a modular shelving system with dorm rooms in mind.
abstract: Quirky, the design collective whose products are often true to its name, has melded milk crate shelving, Lego blocks, and hipster design to create "crates," a modular shelving system with dorm rooms in mind.

headline.main: Furniture That Is Quirky but Functional
headline.print_headline: Milk Crate Storage Gets An Upgrade
